document.full_text: canada says the current commodities boom could last decades and warned developing countries against being too timid with interest rate hikes, while the international monetary fund said that much of the latin american economy is overheating.
document.title: commodity boom weighs on policy in americas
lines_and_colors: canada says the current commodities boom could last decades and warned developing countries against being too timid with interest rate hikes, while the international monetary fund said that much of the latin american economy is overheating.
